meanings.definition: Possessing the highest level of intelligence or mental capacity.
meanings.sent1: She is the brainiest student in the class.
meanings.sent2: The brainiest person in the room always has the best ideas.
meanings.sent3: Even the brainiest scientists can sometimes make mistakes.
meanings.sent4: Her brainiest friend is like a walking encyclopedia.
meanings.sent5: His brainiest moments come when he's solving complex puzzles.

meanings.definition: The superlative form of 'brainy', meaning extremely intelligent or clever.
meanings.sent1: He is known as the brainiest in the group for his quick thinking.
meanings.sent2: The brainiest in the competition won by solving the most challenging problems.
meanings.sent3: The brainiest at the party impressed everyone with their knowledge of trivia.
meanings.sent4: In the world of computers, she is considered the brainiest for her innovative designs.
meanings.sent5: The brainiest of the siblings always comes up with creative solutions to problems.
